DOC.brief_summary: Measurement surface roughness tow different material denture base find material hygienic decreasing amount bacterial accumulation .
DOC.brief_title: Surface Roughness Heat Cured Acrylic Resin Versus Acrylic Resin With Titanium Dioxide
DOC.detailed_description: Using denture base material standard value rapid heat cure acrylic resin compare new material conventional acrylic resin addition titanium dioxide nano particle surface roughness measuring device call stylus profilometer do 20 patient trial take 6 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Completely edentulous maxillary arch fully dentate mandibular arch adequate interarch space . 2 . The edentulous ridge cover firm healthy mucosa . 3 . Angle class I maxillomandibular relationship 4 . Healthy cooperative patient 1 . Patients bad habit severe clench bruxism , drug alcohol addiction , moderate heavy smoking ( great 10 cigarettes/day ) . 2 . Previous history radiotherapy chemotherapy . 3 . Any skeletal problem dictate surgical intervention
